title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1806.41 - Registration and eligibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1806.41 - Registration and eligibility

State Regulations
(a) Project
sponsors of grandfathered projects identified in section
1806.40
of this Part shall submit
a registration to the commission, on a form and in a manner prescribed by the
commission, by December 31, 2019. (b) Any grandfathered project that fails to
register under subdivision (a) of this section shall be subject to review and
approval under section
1806.4
of this Part. (c) Any project that is not eligible to
register under subdivision (a) of this section shall be subject to review and
approval under section
1806.4
of this Part. (d) The commission may establish fees for
obtaining and maintaining registration in accordance with section
1806.35
of this Part. (e) A registration under this section, sections
1806.40
and
1806.42
-1806.45 of this Part may
be transferred pursuant to section
1806.6
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1806.41

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
